node.title: 'I slid headfirst for about 70 metres': Britt Cox is glad she can't remember the crash that almost ended her career
node.alt: Britt Cox poses with her skis in front of a black background and looks to the side.
node.description: Moguls skier Britt Cox was taking on the world and winning, until she broke her collarbone and six ribs in a crash. Determined to get back into form, she's now eyeing a fourth Winter Olympics.
node.content:
["Britt Cox was just 15 years old when she became the youngest competitor at the 2010 Vancouver Winter Olympic Games.", "On that debut in Canada, she\u00a0was Australia's youngest winter Olympian since 1960.", "Now 27 years old, Cox is aiming to compete at a fourth Winter Games in Beijing in 2022.", "\"When I qualified for my first Games at the age of 15, I did not expect to be there, it just kind of happened,\" she said.", "\"I've dreamt of being the best I possibly can at mogul skiing and with the Olympics being the pinnacle of our sport, the idea of competing in my fourth Olympics is really exciting.\"", "Cox grew up in a family of passionate mogul skiers, hitting the slopes\u00a0at Falls Creek in the Victorian Alps.", "Two years after her Winter Olympic debut, Cox became Australia's first female medallist in moguls, clinching bronze at the 2012 World Cup at Deer Valley, USA.", "She repeated that feat in Lake Placid in 2013 and finished fifth at the 2014 Sochi Games, which was the highest placing by an Australian female mogul skier at the Olympics.", "", "
Britt Cox placed\u00a0fifth at the 2014 Sochi Winter Olympic Games.(Getty Images: Cameron Spencer)
", "
History-making season
", "Cox snagged another two bronze medals in 2015 but the 2016/17 World Cup season was her best.", "She won seven gold medals to join Olympic Champion Alisa Camplin\u00a0with the most wins in a\u00a0season.", "Cox also made history in Sierra Nevada, Spain, when she became Australia's first female moguls world champion and\u00a0won the Overall Freestyle Skiing Crystal Globe as the most prolific athlete across all disciplines \u2014 moguls, aerials, ski cross, slopestyle, halfpipe and big air.", "\"It was my breakout season,\" she said.", "", "
Cox dominated the 2016/17 season with seven World Cup victories.(Reuters: Paul Hann)
", "
Bar set high for 2018 in PyeongChang
", "Expectations were high for Cox heading to the 2018 PyeongChang Games, where she was rated one of Australia's best gold medal prospects.", "With that came immense pressure.", "\"I definitely set the bar high,\" she said.", "", "
There were great expectations for\u00a0Cox going into the 2018 Winter Olympics.(AP: Kin Cheung)
", "A mistake on a jump left Cox with a fifth-placed finish and some soul searching.", "\"In some people's eyes, that may have been an underachievement,\" she said.", "
A near career-ending crash
", "Cox went on to secure bronze in 2019 at the opening World Cup event in Ruka, Finland.", "But Winter Olympic sports are among the most dangerous, especially those combining high jumps with fast speed.", "The next event in China was almost Cox's last.", "The horror crash left her unconscious, with six broken ribs and a broken collarbone.", "", "
Australian mogul skier Britt Cox gives a thumbs up from her hospital bed after injuring herself in China in 2019.(Supplied: Britt Cox)
", "\"I don't recall any of it and still don't remember any of what happened,\" she said.", "\"I did watch it [the accident] back once on video and don't want to watch it ever again.\"", "Cox was forced out of the remaining 2019/20 season and returned to Australia to have surgery.", "A plate was inserted in her collarbone and later removed while she underwent intense rehabilitation.", "Cox regards not having any memory of that accident as a \"blessing in disguise\".", "It allowed her to focus on her physical recovery, while yoga kept her mentally grounded.", "As well as enjoying an Australian summer for the first time in almost a decade, Cox paid tribute to her family and the Olympic Winter Institute for their \"incredible support\",\u00a0carrying her through the lows and highs.", "", "
Cox doesn't have any memory of her accident and regards that\u00a0as a blessing.(Supplied: Britt Cox)
", "But as Cox slowly got back into skiing and jumping, the onset of the COVID-19 pandemic added further disruptions to training.", "With the logistical problems of travelling during COVID, Cox and other winter athletes have benefited from a new facility in Brisbane, the Geoff Henke Olympic Winter Training Centre.", "The outdoor ski centre includes a $6.5 million ramp that was opened for use\u00a0late last year and is the first of its kind in the southern hemisphere.", "
Gratitude and optimism ahead of Beijing 2022
", "Cox is back overseas, competing in numerous key qualification and World Cup events in the hope of reaching her fourth Winter Olympics in February.", "\"The team won't be announced until right before the Games, so we're fighting for positions,\" she said.", "", "
Cox is up for the fight for a position in the Australian team\u00a0for Beijing.(Source: Olympic Winter Institute of Australia)
", "An avid yogi and eternal optimist, Cox is a big believer in practising gratitude.", "\"I turned a negative [the accident] into a positive and made my body strong again,\" she said."]
